start_message: Hello! I am a regular AI bot, but I can become anything you want ğŸ˜‰ Here's a brief list of my commands that might be useful for you: - /menu - Show the main menu with additional options and settings. - /save [name] - Save the current chat history with the specified name. If no name is specified, I will ask you to enter one. - /load [name] - Load the saved history. - /delete [name] - Delete the saved history. - /clear - Clear the current history and instruction. - /setinst [instruction] - Set the system instruction. - /delinst - Clear the current system instruction. - /edit - Edit the last response. - /language [language] - Change the language.
begin_chat: Write any message to chat with me.
info_text: Information: ğŸ“ Instruction: {system_instruction} ğŸ“Š Messages in history: {history_count} ({tokens} tokens) ğŸ’¾ Saved histories: {saved_histories_count}

confirm_update_language: ğŸ¤” Are you sure you want to change the language to '{lang_name}'?

confirm_load_history: âš ï¸ Are you sure you want to load the history '{history_name}'?
